column1: The vital role of proteins in understanding human biology has been recognized for many decades

column6: thoroughly validated assays that covers ~3000 proteins.

column1: Here are three examples

We are interested in exploring the mechanisms behind new restaurant discovery. Research shows that different types of customers are drawn to different mixes of information depending on both factors like personal interests and context. Can you help us explore deeper behavioral differences between these discovery cohorts in order to influence UX and recommendation algorithms?

You notice an unexplainable drop off in a sign up funnel and seek out a research partner to explore why it is happening. How can you use triangulated data to inspire new product experiences that drive conversion?
We’ve observed in qual that five participants used search to find content that was not visible on the homepage. What is the actual opportunity size of this behavior in search logs?

We need to reach out to a specific and unique audience so we can send them a survey. Can you help us pull a list of eligible audience members that match particular behavioral criteria so the research operations function can contact them?

column1: Here are three examples

We are interested in exploring the mechanisms behind new restaurant discovery. Research shows that different types of customers are drawn to different mixes of information depending on both factors like personal interests and context. Can you help us explore deeper behavioral differences between these discovery cohorts in order to influence UX and recommendation algorithms?

You notice an unexplainable drop off in a sign up funnel and seek out a research partner to explore why it is happening. How can you use triangulated data to inspire new product experiences that drive conversion?
We’ve observed in qual that five participants used search to find content that was not visible on the homepage. What is the actual opportunity size of this behavior in search logs?

We need to reach out to a specific and unique audience so we can send them a survey. Can you help us pull a list of eligible audience members that match particular behavioral criteria so the research operations function can contact them?

column1: Here are three examples

We are interested in exploring the mechanisms behind new restaurant discovery. Research shows that different types of customers are drawn to different mixes of information depending on both factors like personal interests and context. Can you help us explore deeper behavioral differences between these discovery cohorts in order to influence UX and recommendation algorithms?

You notice an unexplainable drop off in a sign up funnel and seek out a research partner to explore why it is happening. How can you use triangulated data to inspire new product experiences that drive conversion?
We’ve observed in qual that five participants used search to find content that was not visible on the homepage. What is the actual opportunity size of this behavior in search logs?

We need to reach out to a specific and unique audience so we can send them a survey. Can you help us pull a list of eligible audience members that match particular behavioral criteria so the research operations function can contact them?

column1: About The Role
As a Research Data Scientist at DoorDash

column1: Here are three examples

We are interested in exploring the mechanisms behind new restaurant discovery. Research shows that different types of customers are drawn to different mixes of information depending on both factors like personal interests and context. Can you help us explore deeper behavioral differences between these discovery cohorts in order to influence UX and recommendation algorithms?

You notice an unexplainable drop off in a sign up funnel and seek out a research partner to explore why it is happening. How can you use triangulated data to inspire new product experiences that drive conversion?
We’ve observed in qual that five participants used search to find content that was not visible on the homepage. What is the actual opportunity size of this behavior in search logs?

We need to reach out to a specific and unique audience so we can send them a survey. Can you help us pull a list of eligible audience members that match particular behavioral criteria so the research operations function can contact them?

Work alongside expert research leads to bring a unique data-driven perspective to product and business insight
Use quantitative analysis and the presentation of data to see beyond the numbers and understand what drives our business
Provide insights to help business and product leaders understand marketplace dynamics
Produce recommendations and use statistical techniques and hypothesis testing to validate your findings
Identify and measure levers to help move essential metrics and make recommendations
We’re Excited About You Because You Have…
A degree in Math
3+ years of experience in analytics
